Summary: Disc-like shaped lights; dlowing ether balls soundless, shape-changing, travels very swiftly
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Fireball, Oval, Sphere, Star-like
divs: sighting detailsi was leaving to go to the convenience store with my friend, t. he was driving. i pointed up to the sky, "hey t. look, it looks like a flying saucer over there..." over the treetops. he agreed. we stopped at convenience store and he went in. while he was there, i looked acroos the tree through a samll grove a trees and saw several fireball like lights apparently blinking, growing large and smaller, coming closer and getting smalloer as the moved backwards, apparently floating around like fish in an aquarium, pulsating blue, purple, pink, red. not much yellow or gree colors. then t. came back to the car and i pointed them out. he agreed that they certainly did look strange. then we drove up around the corned and went through the drive through atm at the credit union so i could get some cash. then we drove south a few blocks, mad a short series turns, right, left, right--and drove a few more blocks. just when we were to turn left to go to my apartment off of culebra road, i looked up in the sky where i had seen the craft before. i said "look t. is the flying saucer again...turn right!" no...i gotta get back" i argued, "t...turn this gd car right right now!!!" (usually we drove my car, but this time we were in my friend ts car, a small white chevy, so it was strange that i was demanding where we should go)we drove about 1 block north toward a large radio antennae....look! we saw several elliptical disc-shaped apparent crafts, just the lights but no actual metal bodies. the lights pulsated left-right-left-right..., colored pink, red, purple, blue, pink (i saw no bright orange or yellowish colors and no bright lime greens) i have an art degree, and good at drawing and painting, so i noticed this...the "ships" floated around, first i saw 2-3, then number increased to 6-7.....they changed forms from ether \fireballs to the long elliptical\disc shaped crafts....and then back again.... they soundlessly moved precisely like fish in an aquarium- up and down, left to right and back again, backwards-forwards and back again. their altitude was about as high as a 8-10 story building and fluctuating higheer and lower. at one point, one did descend to the groand and then back up again to the original height of an 8 story building. the length of all the crafts together was 1\2 mile or so. fluctuated between the craft-like shape and the bright, glowing, ehter balls pulsating those red-blue-pink-purple colors. after about 90 seconds or two minutes or so of this, they all reverted to one large fireball---it lifted in the sky to the northwest---over the ingram mall. it moved very quickly and moved with no sound at anytime. t. and i were speechless and dumbfounded, he said he had to get back to my apartment as he was expecting a call. i was afraid to report the sightings...but then i read about the sightings in stephensville in january or february 2007. my sighting seems related. the things i saw moved in the direction of the texas hill country, where stephensivlle is located. what me and t saw, was over a large vacant area of land, near the radio tower, just about 1 mile south of ingram mall. i wondered why nobody else in the area seemed to report this or see it. i heard about nothing like it until stephensville report. the objects i saw were nothing like the many different types of aircraft i see flying around s. san antonio regularly. we had a friend in the back seat of the car. i yelled at him repeatedly to look but he refused because he was sleeping. i was sitting in the passenger side of the front seat throught these incidents. there was a ceiling of gray clouds that evening, but it was very high and far away, perhaps 3-4 miles from the ground.
